rows.text: The International Conference in Logistics and Supply Chain Management 2006
Invited by The University of Hong Kong. HKPW was the guest performer in the conference.
Loke Yew Hall, The University of Hong Kong, Pokfulam
TWGHs Wong Fut Nam College 45th Anniversary Concert
As the guest performer in the concert
Academic Community Hall, Hong Kong Baptist University, Kowloon Tong
The 14th APBDA Biennial Convention
Musical exchange with the bands from various Asian countries. HKPW participated in a joint concert.
Grand Auditorium, Macao Cultural Centre, Macao
Premiere Concert
Cooperated with the well-known clarinetist Mr. Wong Chi-fai Anthony, HKPW held its first profit-making concert.
Concert Hall, Hong Kong City Hall, Central
Christmas and Happy New Year Show
During the holidays, HKPW performed in a shopping mall.
Main Street, Discovery Park Shopping Mall, Tsuen Wan
"Childhood" Concert
Featuring distinguished guest conductors Mr. Pak Wing-heng and Mr. Choy Kwok-tin Martin, HKPW played a selection of cartoon music.
Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre, Kwai Tsing
Annual Concert 2007
To celebrate the 2nd Anniversary, HKPW invited the flutist Ms. Carmen Ma and oboist Mr. Danny Yau Ka-kei to perform the much praised flute-oboe duet
Concert Hall, Hong Kong City Hall, Central
Christmas Show
Performed in the shopping mall again during the holiday.
Main Street, Discovery ParkShopping Mall, Tsuen Wan
"PIT! on Stage" Concert
With the theme of musical and operatic music, HKPW recapitulated the classical scene of musical.
Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre, Kwai Tsing
1st Writing and Drawing Contest Award Ceremony
Invited by Hong Kong Quality Assurance Association, HKPW performed in the ceremony.
Chiang Chen Studio Theatre, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, Hung Hom
Annual Concert 2008
HKPW invited Mr. Wong Wai-on Wryane, principal euphonium, to be the soloist in Annual Concert 2008, celebrating the 3rd Anniversary of the Band.
Auditorium, Shatin Town Hall, Shatin
"Childhood 2 - Adventure of Isla de Pascua's Prince" Concert

Apart from cooperating with prominent percussionist Mr. Choy Lap-tak, using a series of popular repertoire and youth story-tellers, HKPW presented a creative, and exciting adventure story of the price from Isla de Pascua.
Auditorium, Shatin Town Hall, Shatin
Starry Night Home Coming Concert
Invited by TWGHs Wong Fut Nam College, HKPW performed in the captioned concert.
School Hall, TWGHs Wong Fut Nam College, Kowloon Tong
Annual Concert 2009
HKPW invited Mr. Scott Liu, tuba soloist, to present an inspiring music story. Meanwhile, using the story, HKPW introduced different roles and features of instruments in a band.
Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Tsuen Wan
Lok Sin Tong x My Jewelry Charitable Event & Volunteers' Oath Taking Ceremony
HKPW brass ensemble was invited by Lok Sin Tong, a local charity, to play in its volunteers’ oath-taking ceremony.
1/F Atrium, Tsuen Wan Plaza, Tsuen Wan
A Night with Trombone & Bo-yee NG
Corporating with the young Trombone player, HKPW held the first recital.
Culture and Activities Hall, Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Tsuen Wan
"The Music Travellers' Night" Concert
The fourth themed concert that is held by HKPW. A series of classic band repertoires are performed. Meanwhile, it introduced the history of HK band music and famous composers in the world.
Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Tsuen Wan
School Visits
Invited by Hong Kong Institute of Christian Counselors, HKPW brass ensemble performed in college performance.
Carmel Secondary School and International Christian Quality Music Secondary and Primary School
Symphonic Band Concert by Youngsters of China & US
Invited to participate in the International Performance Season of the Children's Art Exchange (Shenzhen 2010), HKPW exchange their music with the bands from Alaska and Shenzhen.
Theatre, Shenzhen Children’s Palace
16th Asia Pacific Band Festival (Hong Kong 2010)
HKPW have a co-performance with the other bands from Hong Kong, Taiwan and Beijing.
Queen Elizabeth Stadium, Wan Chai
30 Jul 2010 and 7 Aug 2010
20th Anniversary of Asian Youth Orchestra (Hong Kong Music Summer) - HK Community & Outreach Concert Series
HKPW had 4 free public performance in various venue.
Cathay City, Tung Chung; Olympian City, Mongkok and Discovery Park, Tsuen Wan
"Bass Tuba" Recital
Corporating with the young Tuba player, HKPW held the first recital.
Culture and Activities Hall, Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Tsuen Wan
The 5th Anniversary Concert
HKPW performed various extraordinary pieces in the fifth annual concert.
Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Tsuen Wan
HKPW Chamber Concert
HKPW performed pieces themed different planets, brought the audience to a music space journey.
Cultural Activities Hall Shatin Town Hall Shatin
25 June 2011
HKPW X JAZZ Concert
The first jazz concert by HKPW, giving the audience a new impression.
Auditorium Tsuen Wan Town Hall Tsuen Wan
7 July 2011
Exchange Tour - The 15th WASBE Conference 2011
HKPW was invited to Chiayi City, Taiwan for a music interflow with bands from other places.
Wen Hua Park, Chiayi City, Taiwan
Annual Concert 2011
Corporating with the trumpet player from the Sinfonietta, Mr Fung Ka-Hing, HKPW held the sixth themed concert.
Concert Hall Hong Kong City Hall Central
Hong Kong Winter Fest
HKPW band members were invited to celebrate the new year eve with music.
Statue Square Central Hong Kong
Childhood 3 - Finding Rainbow
For the first time, HKPW combined our music with the self-written creative multi-media musical, audience might find their childhood memories and own rainbow-in-heart.
Auditorium Tsuen Wan Town Hall Tsuen Wan
C for Clarinet - Clarinet recital by Johnny Fong Hiu-kai
HKPW gladly presented the clarinet solo recital by Johnny Fong Hiu-kai, Principal Clarinet of Hong Kong Sinfonietta.
Cultural Activities Hall Shatin Town Hall Shatin
20 April 2012
Jazzy Percussion

HKPW invited famous local percussionist Choy Lap-tak, our Principal Percussion Andrew Lau Pok-man as well as other local percussionists to perform in percussion ensembles in this recital. Groovy Party, a jazz ensemble also performed in the concert.
Cultural Activities Hall Tsuen Wan Town Hall Tsuen Wan
HKPW Chamber Concert 2012
HKPW Chamber Concert 2012 features various chamber works performed by HKPW Ensembles.
Cultural Activities Hall Tsuen Wan Town Hall Tsuen Wan
Basic Notes Jazz Big Band Live 2012
HKPW presented a marvelous jazz concert performed by Basic Notes Jazz Big Band.
Cultural Activities Hall Shatin Town Hall Shatin
